examples: The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
That letter should go by special delivery.
They celebrated the special occasion with a beautifully molded aspic.
The chef's special included a tender beef fillet served on a bed of creamy garlic mash.
The bakery showcased a special maple sugar cake as the highlight of their seasonal menu.
words.defineEn: different from, greater, or better than what is normal
words.defineVi: khác với, lớn hơn hoặc tốt hơn những gì bình thường

examples: My friend's birthday is on a Friday this year.
Finally the couple may be celebrating a birthday, a wedding anniversary or some other red-letter day.
It's your friends birthday.
I bought a toy for my nephew's birthday.
He hid my son's new bicycle until his birthday
words.defineEn: the day and month of your birth in every year
words.defineVi: ngày và tháng sinh của bạn trong mỗi năm

examples: The next day was Christmas Day.
There was no basketball until Christmas Day.
And now to the Christmas Day bombing that rocked Nashville, Tennessee.
Monday is Christmas Day, and I haven't got any presents for them.
Authorities identify the man behind the Christmas Day bombing, as the investigation turns to possible motives.
words.defineEn: a Christian holiday celebrated on December twenty-fifth to commemorate the birth of Jesus Christ
words.defineVi: một ngày lễ Kitô giáo được tổ chức vào ngày 25 tháng 12 để kỷ niệm sự ra đời của Chúa Giêsu Kitô

examples: The orange pumpkin was perfect for Halloween.
Halloween is celebrated on the last day of October.
So halloween is now a huge industry.
Party City's Halloween competitors include Spirit Halloween, Walmart and Target.
Because some neighbors still throw handfuls of dirty pennies into Halloween bags.
words.defineEn: the evening of October 31 when it is believed ghosts or the dead appear and people usually wear special costumes, mostly frightening ones to celebrate this day
words.defineVi: tối ngày 31 tháng 10 khi người ta tin rằng ma hoặc người chết xuất hiện và mọi người thường mặc trang phục đặc biệt, chủ yếu là những bộ trang phục đáng sợ để ăn mừng ngày này

words.defineEn: a day on which two people celebrate their love toward each other and often buy gifts for one another
words.defineVi: một ngày mà hai người kỷ niệm tình yêu của họ dành cho nhau và thường mua quà cho nhau

examples: Give me a call tomorrow.
They're busting a move tomorrow.
We have to learn one of Hamlet's speeches for school tomorrow.
The charges against the suspect will come up in court tomorrow.
The President hits town tomorrow.
words.defineEn: the day that will come after today ends
words.defineVi: ngày sẽ đến sau ngày hôm nay kết thúc

examples: Temperatures hit 40° yesterday.
Yesterday he baked a loaf of whole wheat bread.
I handed in my notice yesterday.
I only started this book yesterday.
The battle lines were drawn yesterday for the fiercest contest in the history of local radio.
words.defineEn: the day before today; the previous day
words.defineVi: ngày trước ngày hôm nay; ngày hôm trước

words.defineEn: the day on which mothers are appreciated and often receive gifts from their children
words.defineVi: ngày mà các bà mẹ được đánh giá cao và thường nhận được quà từ con cái của họ

examples: Today is Monday.
I'm going monk mode from Monday.
Jessica died Monday.
I have a team meeting every Monday afternoon.
After a fun weekend I was back in harness on Monday, handling paperwork at my desk.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Sunday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau chủ nhật

examples: The party is on Friday evening.
His favorite band is playing a concert on Friday night.
US President Joe Biden got the clean bill of health on Friday after a detailed physical examination.
My friend's birthday is on a Friday this year.
Matt came round each Friday, regular as clockwork.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Thursday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ năm

words.defineEn: a Christian holiday celebrating the resurrection of Jesus Christ
words.defineVi: một ngày lễ Kitô giáo kỷ niệm sự phục sinh của Chúa Giêsu Kitô

examples: Today is Monday.
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
The euro hit a record low in trading today.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: the day that is taking place right now
words.defineVi: ngày đang diễn ra ngay bây giờ

words.defineEn: the day that comes first in the calendar year and is a public holiday in most countries
words.defineVi: ngày đầu tiên trong năm dương lịch và là ngày nghỉ lễ ở hầu hết các quốc gia

words.defineEn: a decorated cake served at wedding receptions to celebrate the marriage of a couple
words.defineVi: một chiếc bánh được trang trí phục vụ tại tiệc cưới để kỷ niệm cuộc hôn nhân của một cặp vợ chồng

examples: The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
A couple of years in the army should make a man of him.
Good wine can make a meal.
The news really made my day.
words.defineEn: to prepare or cook something
words.defineVi: để chuẩn bị hoặc nấu một cái gì đó

examples: The cake was burnt to a cinder.
The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful
My grandmother's hazelnut cake was a crowd-pleaser at the family reunion.
Oh, that takes the cake!
I baked a chocolate cake for my friend's birthday.
words.defineEn: a sweet food that is made by mixing flour, butter or oil, sugar, eggs and other ingredients and then backing it in an oven
words.defineVi: một món ăn ngọt được làm bằng cách trộn bột mì, bơ hoặc dầu, đường, trứng và các thành phần khác rồi cho vào lò nướng

examples: A touch of maple extract in the pancake batter gives them a delightful maple syrup taste.
The finance minister's fall from grace gave his enemies great satisfaction.
Give sweetsop a try!
The morgue gives me the jitters.
This old house gives me the willies.
words.defineEn: to offer a thing to a person
words.defineVi: để cung cấp một điều cho một người

examples: Someone has stacked the cards against me.
He's still playing his cards close to his chest.
Anne's aunt always sends her birthday cards and gifts.
She drew a red heart on the card, with words of love and appreciation.
Marriage has been on the cards from day one.
words.defineEn: a piece of stiff and thick paper, usually rectangular in shape, that is used for sending messages, greetings, invitations, etc.
words.defineVi: một mảnh giấy cứng và dày, thường có hình chữ nhật, được sử dụng để gửi tin nhắn, lời chào, lời mời, v.v.

examples: The lawyer presented the right argument in court.
Bring Helen a present.
Bring a present for Helen.
He presented a false document as evidence in the court case.
Our hosts presented us with an embarrassment of riches.
words.defineEn: something given to someone as a sign of appreciation or on a special occasion
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được trao cho ai đó như một dấu hiệu của sự đánh giá cao hoặc vào một dịp đặc biệt

examples: All newspapers sang from the same song sheet.
We sang songs to pass the time.
She can't sing for toffee.
Every night she sings the baby to sleep.
Cheerleaders from both schools sang the National Anthem before the start of the game and there were chills down my spine.
words.defineEn: to use our voice in order to produce musical sounds in the form of a tune or song
words.defineVi: sử dụng giọng nói của chúng tôi để tạo ra âm thanh âm nhạc dưới dạng một giai điệu hoặc bài hát

examples: Alice's song hits the airwaves.
That song always sends a shiver down my spine.
Fans have given the band's new song their seal of approval.
That band's new song is really off the hook!
She bought the painting for a song.
words.defineEn: a piece of music that has words
words.defineVi: một bản nhạc có lời

examples: Fireworks displays are common in many countries during the month of July.
The event finished with a spectacular fireworks display.
The country celebrated its independence with a grand parade and fireworks.
In January, we celebrate the start of the new year with fireworks and joy.
I heard what sounded like fireworks.
words.defineEn: (usually plural) a small thing containing explosive powder that produces bright colors and a loud noise when it explodes or burns, mostly used at celebrations
words.defineVi: (thường là số nhiều) một vật nhỏ chứa bột nổ tạo ra màu sắc tươi sáng và tạo ra tiếng động lớn khi nổ hoặc cháy, chủ yếu được sử dụng trong các lễ kỷ niệm

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to hold, possess, or own an object or a quality
words.defineVi: để giữ, sở hữu, hoặc sở hữu một đối tượng hoặc một chất lượng

examples: His face wore a puzzled look.
Both men wore confident smiles.
My mom wears facial mask sometmes.
The police officer wears a uniform and a badge.
He wears glasses now.
words.defineEn: to have something such as clothes, shoes, etc. on your body
words.defineVi: để có một cái gì đó như quần áo, giày dép, vv trên cơ thể của bạn

examples: Put your clothes in the cupboard.
She gave him presents and clothes.
All clothes are in mint condition and less than two years old.
She received many compliments on her stylish clothes.
My clothes won't all go in that one suitcase.
words.defineEn: the things we wear to cover our body, such as pants, shirts, and jackets
words.defineVi: những thứ chúng ta mặc để che thân, chẳng hạn như quần, áo sơ mi và áo khoác

examples: In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
That party was off the hook!
The party continued into the wee small hours.
The party is on Friday evening.
But the party was over all too quickly for little Nicole.
words.defineEn: an event where people get together and enjoy themselves by talking, dancing, eating, drinking, etc.
words.defineVi: một sự kiện nơi mọi người gặp nhau và tận hưởng bằng cách nói chuyện, khiêu vũ, ăn, uống, v.v.

examples: Good wine can make a meal.
The chef cooks a delicious meal in the restaurant.
Meals can be served to you in your room.
She cooked a delicious meal in the kitchen.
She enjoys cooking meals for her family in the kitchen of their home.
words.defineEn: the food that you eat on regular occasions during the day, especially breakfast, lunch, or dinner; or any of these occasions
words.defineVi: thức ăn mà bạn ăn thường xuyên trong ngày, đặc biệt là bữa sáng, bữa trưa hoặc bữa tối; hoặc bất kỳ dịp nào trong số này

words.defineEn: to leave the house to go somewhere, usually to do something enjoyable
words.defineVi: rời khỏi nhà để đi đâu đó, thường là để làm điều gì đó thú vị

examples: Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.
The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
words.defineEn: someone we know well, like a lot, and trust, but normally they are not part of our family
words.defineVi: một người mà chúng ta biết rõ, rất thích và tin tưởng, nhưng thông thường họ không phải là một phần của gia đình chúng ta
